Title: Partnerships, The 100 Club
Details: A student-initiated project, The 100 Club runs masterminds community to support a private network of founders (https://the100club.io/)
Secured various partnerships for The 100 Club with local restaurants and brands to provide members of the community exclusive benefits

Title: NUS Teaching Assitant (Programming Methodology II)
Details: Responsible for conducting weekly lab sessions and providing constructive feedback for students in the area of Java Object Oriented Programming (OOP) and Functional Programming
Provided guidance for students to create their own Discrete Event Simulator in Java

Title: MICRON NUS-ISE Business Analytics Case Competition 2023
Details: Designed a simulation of a manufacturing plant to model the constraints of various workstations and steps in the manufacturing process
Developed decision making algorithms for the model to maximise the number of completed products over a period of 1 week

Title: NUS Hack&Roll Hackathon 2023
Details: Developed a platform to facilitate the process of meetups between friends by recommending a restaurant in the middle of both individuals (https://malcolminthemiddle.netlify.app/)
Contributed to the backend development of the platform with the usage of Google Maps API

Title: AI Singapore, National AI Student Challenge 2022, Category B
Details: Developed a face shape classification model to create better recommendations for individuals looking to get new glasses using AI Singaporeâ€™s Computer Vision API (https://github.com/joesurf/faceshape)
Pre-processed dataset of images to improve training accuracy of machine learning model
Managed backend development to integrate face shape classification model with PeekingDuck API pipeline (https://github.com/aisingapore/PeekingDuck)

Title: 11th USP House Committee, Triton House Captain
Details: Faciliated the transition of the community House System as USP transitioned to NUS College
Planned a variety of events for more than 200 people on a throughout the year
